item.title: Discord Community
item.description:
For months the community has been asking for a single place to talk, debug, and share ideas between releases.

WAHA Discord is finally open to the community (for Plus and PRO supporters) so you can keep the momentum going. ðŸŽ‰

item.title: How to support WAHA using Crypto
item.description: In this article, we’re going to cover different techniques for those who not familiar with crypto payments how you can still support the project and get WAHA Plus and WAHA PRO.
